summary: This is an email chain from September 20, 2019, between individuals (names redacted) discussing coordination regarding victims in the Epstein case. It references a recent meeting with a victim, the ongoing open investigation, and the need for weekly updates to Executive Management.

events.title: Meeting with victim
events.description: A meeting was held with a victim on Wednesday, September 18, 2019.

keyFacts: The Epstein case was an open investigation as of September 20, 2019.
Executive Management was requesting weekly updates on the case.
A Victim Specialist was coordinating victim assistance, including counseling and service referrals.
Email communication indicates coordination among team members regarding victim contact and updates.
References are made to an individual in Phoenix and a meeting in Los Angeles, indicating a multi-location investigation.
